channel.title: Finance
channel.description: This is a randomly ordered feed of the most recent entries from Finance, skipping any feeds with errors.

item.title: The ‘dumb money’ steps in as traders lose $1 trillion on the realization that AI will eat tech companies first
item.description: The chaos is mostly a tech-stock phenomenon. The equal-weight S&P 500 is actually at a record high.

item.title: United States Demands Gavi Remove Thimerosal From Vaccines. Here’s Why And What It Means For Public Health
item.description: A physician breaks down why the U.S. has asked Gavi to remove thimerosal from vaccines and what the public health consequences are for the world.

item.title: The 2026 private equity outlook appears hazy, says PitchBook
item.description: PitchBook data shows private equity exit value surged, even as fundraising struggled.

item.title: Developer Hongkong Land launches a $6.5B Singapore real estate fund, the country’s largest, as part of CEO Michael Smith’s strategic pivot
item.description: The new fund has the Qatar Investment Authority as a key investor, as Hongkong Land focuses on commercial property and slims its residential business.

item.title: Less than 10% of employees believe their bosses are demonstrating moral leadership
item.description: Also: All the news and watercooler chat from Fortune.

item.title: Chrysler recalls more than 450,000 vehicles over brake light failure
item.description: Chrysler recalled more than 450,000 vehicles and more than 2,000 tow-trailer modules due to a brake light failure that could raise the risk of a crash...

item.title: Cigna 2025 Profits Hit Nearly $6 Billion Even As Costs Keep Rising
item.description: The Cigna Group reported 2025 net income of nearly $6 billion despite grappling with rising costs of patients in the health insurance plans it sells a...

item.title: SIVGA’s SV021 Pro Headphones Billed As Next Evolution In Closed-Back Headphones
item.description: Building on the success of the SV021, the new closed-back SV021 Pro headphones improve on the predecessor model by delivering extra detail from the ne...

item.title: Tesla’s Semi Is Finally Hitting The Road. The Timing Couldn’t Be Worse
item.description: Elon Musk’s “beast” arrives as federal support for EVs withers and rising power costs complicate his claim that it will be cheaper to run than diesel ...

item.title: This Gen Z woman applied for 1,000 jobs and offered to cut her own pay because she was ‘really broke and struggling.’ She’s not alone
item.description: Taking a pay cut at the beginning of your career can have long-term consequences.

item.title: Shut Down And Restart—Microsoft Confirms Windows Update Mistake
item.description: Be very careful — do not lose your work after update mistake confirmed.

item.title: Close Bank of England vote on rates sends pound lower
How to use all those ‘best places to retire’ lists to find your perfect spot
JPMorgan strategist says bitcoin could reach $266,000, but not this year
Bitcoin trades below $70,000 for first time since 2024
Private sector added 22,000 jobs in January, well below expectations, ADP says
item.description: The figure reported on Wednesday is below economists’ estimates of an increase of 48,000 jobs and higher than the prior month’s revised reading of a g...

item.title: Why this Fed move has quietly had a huge impact on your finances
Fed's Miran maintains call for aggressive interest rate cuts this year
item.description: Federal Reserve Governor Stephen Miran is calling for aggressive interest rate cuts exceeding one percentage point after dissenting in the latest FOMC...

item.title: Energy giant bets big on US, says its electricity market 'hottest' in the world
item.description: Siemens Energy announced a $1 billion investment to expand U.S. grid equipment and turbine production, citing surging power demand driven by artificia...

item.title: China moves to ban feature commonly seen on Tesla vehicles over fear of trapped passengers
item.description: China bans electronic door handles starting 2027, requiring mechanical releases after safety incidents left passengers trapped inside vehicles.

item.title: Reid Hoffman Raises $24.6 Million for AI Cancer-Research Startup
item.description: The LinkedIn co-founder is starting Manas AI with “The Emperor of All Maladies” author Siddhartha Mukherjee.

item.title: Silicon Valley Is Raving About a Made-in-China AI Model
item.description: DeepSeek is called “amazing and impressive” despite working with less-advanced chips.

item.title: Tech, Media & Telecom Roundup: Market Talk
item.description: DeepSeek, SoFi and more in the latest Market Talks covering Technology, Media and Telecom.

item.title: What to Know About China's DeepSeek AI
item.description: The Chinese upstart says it has trained high-performing AI models cheaply, without using the most advanced chips.

item.title: Can an App Replace a Personal Trainer? I Tested Nearly a Dozen to Find Out
item.description: Apps can add flexibility and freshness to your routine. Just try not to get injured.
